title: Lyrinian Blade
description: Rough Synopsis:A fallen angel.Torn further from redemption by the half-blood vampire that he loves, Halston struggles with the new dark power he has stolen.Royal siblings left to their own devices.With a taste for blood, Jax and Evina faced with a choice: Stay in the human world, or return to the Netherworld where their mother tries to prevent war.A half-blood taken prisoner.Koa, separated from all that she loves, must break away from her captors, or convince them to join her side against the angels that betrayed her and continue to hunt her.With a war between angels, vampires, and demons, Koa is just one of the keys to saving the world. The other key is the king of Elyan… Koa’s brother. But is his heart as pure as Koa's?As he sets his sights on the Lyrinian throne, the answer can be the difference between life and death for Koa, and all of her loved ones.What Koa doesn’t know is that a demonic beast watches in secret, with her blackened heart set on Koa's death.
author: K.N. Lee
